# Source: https://dagshub.com/docs/feature_guide/automation/

[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://dagshub.com/DagsHub-Official/dagshub-docs/src/main/docs/feature_guide/automation.md "Edit this page")

# DagsHub Automation[¶](#dagshub-automation "Permanent link")

DagsHub Automation provides you the ability to automate time-consuming, iterative tasks in your ML workflow using the tools you love.

## How DagsHub Automation works[¶](#how-dagshub-automation-works "Permanent link")

### [Jenkins](../../integration_guide/jenkins/)[¶](#jenkins "Permanent link")

[Jenkins](https://www.jenkins.io/) is the most popular and mature open-source tool for CI/CD and automation, and it\'s also usable for automating Data Science and Machine Learning workflows. DagsHub has an [official Jenkins plugin](https://plugins.jenkins.io/dagshub-branch-source/) that can scan your DagsHub repos and execute custom pipelines automatically. To learn how to use it, please read the [Jenkins documentation](../../integration_guide/jenkins/) on DagsHub.

### [GitHub Actions](../../integration_guide/github/)[¶](#github-actions "Permanent link")

When connecting a GitHub repository to DagsHub, you can use GitHub Actions for CI/CD as an integral part of the ML project. You can integrate DagsHub storage with your actions, trigger actions when you open a pull request from DagsHub, and more!
